Text: @bone...i've downloaded three diffrent copys of this(all bad audio) so im asking you direct has this got the crappy audio or is it good throughout

ankara all im saying is if i download a movie i hope to understand whats being said in the audio without having to waste time downloading another bad audio..and as for going to the cinema last weekend i went to see the time travellers wife with my mrs and another couple...thats $45 im not getting back
Format and burn the movie to disk, and when you watch it, use one channel (left or right) to hear.  Audio is fine as long as you're not listening in stereo.

Actually _Ankara_, this is a dvdrip but from the other side of the world 9from North America).  All r5s (if labeled properly) have dvdrip video quality, but the audio is redone with a TS.  Obviously there is no TS out for this movie.  don't be such an ass when someone asks a question.

awe.._Ankara_...you hurt my feelings.  lol...this is me laughing. 
if my explanation of an r5 is bullshit (your word) then you tell me what an r5 is?  enlighten me, kid?
